cu.explanation_en: Setting the NGU interface IP to '10.0.0.1', which is in a different subnet, will cause unreachable routing and prevent NG-U interface connectivity.
cu.explanation_zh: 將 NGU 介面 IP 設定為 '10.0.0.1'，該地址位於不同子網中，會導致無法到達的路由，並阻止 NG-U 介面連線。

du.explanation_en: Changing the DL absolute frequency point A from 640008 (band 78) to 1282560 (band 3) creates a frequency misalignment, causing cell search failures and synchronization issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 DL 絕對頻率點 A 從 640008（頻段 78）更改為 1282560（頻段 3）會造成頻率錯位，導致細胞搜尋失敗和同步問題。
